feed.title: MSFS Blog
feed.subtitle: Development updates of Microsoft Flight Simulator.

entry.title: Creator Highlight – Japanese Screenshot Challenge Community
entry.summary: Screenshot from Japanese simmer and X (formerly Twitter) user @ukaka5656.Every week in our Development Update blog, the MSFS Team challenges the community to capture their best screenshots that fit the new weekly theme. We are continually amazed by the dedication of the Screenshot Challenge participants as they showcase beautiful and creative images of aircraft and … Continued

entry.title: October 2nd, 2025 Development Update
entry.summary: This week’s Screenshot Challenge winner is X user vp_sim! If you’re interested in participating in our weekly Screenshot Challenges, check out the details in the Community section below.Following last week’s announcement that Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is coming to Sony PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 5 Pro consoles this December, applications to join the upcoming public beta … Continued

entry.title: October 16th, 2025 Development Update
entry.summary: This week’s Screenshot Challenge winner is X user pommes_l! If you’re interested in participating in our weekly Screenshot Challenges, check out the details in the Community section below.This week saw the release of two new beta test builds for Sim Update 4 for Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. You can read the changelog for these two test builds … Continued

entry.title: September 25th, 2025 Development Update
entry.summary: This week’s Screenshot Challenge winner is Forum user HeKa48! If you’re interested in participating in our weekly Screenshot Challenges, check out the details in the Community section below.The annual Tokyo Game Show is currently in full swing, and Microsoft Flight Simulator is there with several announcements!First, we revealed that Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 will be coming … Continued
